channel.title: üè¢ UC Los Angeles on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ UC Los Angeles on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Compositional Atlas for Algebraic Circuits
item.description: This paper introduces a compositional framework for algebraic circuits, deriving novel tractability conditions for compositional inference queries and unifying existing results.

item.title: A Nearly Optimal and Low-Switching Algorithm for Reinforcement Learning with General Function Approximation
item.description: MQL-UCB: Near-optimal reinforcement learning with low policy switching cost, solving the exploration-exploitation dilemma for complex models.

item.title: Changing the Training Data Distribution to Reduce Simplicity Bias Improves In-distribution Generalization
item.description: Boosting in-distribution generalization is achieved by strategically altering the training data distribution to reduce simplicity bias and promote uniform feature learning.

item.title: Conformalized Time Series with Semantic Features
item.description: Conformalized Time Series with Semantic Features (CT-SSF) significantly improves time-series forecasting by dynamically weighting latent semantic features, achieving greater prediction efficiency whil…

item.title: Ctrl-X: Controlling Structure and Appearance for Text-To-Image Generation Without Guidance
item.description: Ctrl-X: Zero-shot text-to-image generation with training-free structure & appearance control!

item.title: Decision-Focused Learning with Directional Gradients
item.description: New Perturbation Gradient losses connect expected decisions with directional derivatives, enabling Lipschitz continuous surrogates for predict-then-optimize, asymptotically yielding best-in-class poli…

item.title: Fast Sampling via Discrete Non-Markov Diffusion Models with Predetermined Transition Time
item.description: Accelerated discrete diffusion model sampling is achieved via novel discrete non-Markov diffusion models (DNDM) with predetermined transition times, enabling a training-free algorithm that significant…

item.title: GraphVis: Boosting LLMs with Visual Knowledge Graph Integration
item.description: GraphVis boosts LLMs by visualizing knowledge graphs, improving accuracy in textual and visual question answering.

item.title: Integrating Deep Metric Learning with Coreset for Active Learning in 3D Segmentation
item.description: Deep metric learning and Coreset integration enables efficient slice-based active learning for 3D medical segmentation, surpassing existing methods in performance with low annotation budgets.

item.title: Matryoshka Query Transformer for Large Vision-Language Models
item.description: Matryoshka Query Transformer (MQT) empowers large vision-language models with flexible visual token encoding, drastically reducing inference costs while maintaining high accuracy across multiple bench…

item.title: Non-Euclidean Mixture Model for Social Network Embedding
item.description: Non-Euclidean Mixture Model (NMM-GNN) outperforms existing methods by using spherical and hyperbolic spaces to model homophily and social influence in social network embedding, improving link predicti…

item.title: Physics-Informed Regularization for Domain-Agnostic Dynamical System Modeling
item.description: TREAT: a novel framework boosting dynamical systems modeling accuracy by enforcing Time-Reversal Symmetry (TRS) via a regularization term. High-precision modeling is achieved across diverse systems, …

item.title: PureGen: Universal Data Purification for Train-Time Poison Defense via Generative Model Dynamics
item.description: PUREGEN uses generative model dynamics to purify poisoned training data, providing a universal, effective, and efficient train-time defense against various data poisoning attacks.

item.title: Reciprocal Reward Influence Encourages Cooperation From Self-Interested Agents
item.description: Reciprocators: AI agents that learn to cooperate by reciprocating influence, achieving prosocial outcomes in complex scenarios.

item.title: SafeWorld: Geo-Diverse Safety Alignment
item.description: SAFEWORLD: a new benchmark reveals and fixes LLMs’ struggle with diverse safety standards.

item.title: Scaling transformer neural networks for skillful and reliable medium-range weather forecasting
item.description: Stormer, a simple transformer model, achieves state-of-the-art medium-range weather forecasting accuracy by using weather-specific embedding, randomized dynamics forecasting, and a pressure-weighted l…

item.title: Shared Autonomy with IDA: Interventional Diffusion Assistance
item.description: IDA, a novel intervention assistance, dynamically shares control between human and AI copilots by intervening only when the AI’s action is superior across all goals, maximizing performance and preserv…

item.title: SimGen: Simulator-conditioned Driving Scene Generation
item.description: SimGen: Simulator-conditioned driving scene generation, uses a novel cascade diffusion pipeline to generate diverse driving scenes by mixing real-world and simulator data, addressing Sim2Real gaps.

item.title: SmallToLarge (S2L): Scalable Data Selection for Fine-tuning Large Language Models by Summarizing Training Trajectories of Small Models
item.description: SMALLTOLARGE (S2L) revolutionizes large language model (LLM) fine-tuning by using a small model to summarize training loss trajectories, enabling efficient data selection for larger models.
